channel.title: How can I make a Co owner and what can the Co owner do?

item.title: How can I make a Co owner and what can the Co owner do?
item.dc:creator: @sweetgirl40 sweetgirl40
item.description:
@sweetgirl40 wrote:

[quote=“liltwixis11, post:5, topic:71844”]well, you can really make them do whatever you want
if you know how to change their rights, you can make it 2 or 3 or whatever you want
on client.java,after alot of codes
itll says something like this

&& playerRights >= 2) or whatever, that means anyone 2 or over player rights can do that command, so you could change it to whatever you want, so both you and the co-owner could do it, or you could make it so only someonewith a certain name can use it like this

&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAMEHERE")

so what they can do really depends on what you want them to do.[/quote]
TYVM

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make a Co owner and what can the Co owner do?

item.title: How can I make a Co owner and what can the Co owner do?
item.dc:creator: @liltwixis11 liltwixis11
item.description:
@liltwixis11 wrote:

well, you can really make them do whatever you want
if you know how to change their rights, you can make it 2 or 3 or whatever you want
on client.java,after alot of codes
itll says something like this

&& playerRights >= 2) or whatever, that means anyone 2 or over player rights can do that command, so you could change it to whatever you want, so both you and the co-owner could do it, or you could make it so only someonewith a certain name can use it like this

&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAMEHERE")

so what they can do really depends on what you want them to do.

Read full topic
